name: argon
description: Argon is an REST API base project. You can focus on routes whithout thinking of structure

scripts.start: npm run tsc && node -r dotenv/config ./dist/argon.js dotenv_config_path=./.env/dev/.env --node-env=development
scripts.build: npm run tsc && node -r dotenv/config ./dist/argon.js dotenv_config_path=./.env/prod/.env --node-env=production
